name: share-a-quote
title: Share a Quote
description: Copy selected text as a formatted quote with source link
author: alexi.build

commands.name: copy-selected-text-as-quote-with-link
commands.title: Copy Selected Text as Quote with Link
commands.description: Copy selected text as a formatted quote with source link

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
